module.name: packaged_part_black_box_model
module.keywords: module, black box, behaviour, model, analysis, design, electrical, electronic, mechanical, piece part, component

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the information necessary to describe a product as a part for the next level of assembly. The inner structure of this part isn't visible by the electronic assembly designer. This module defines the information necessary to describe the product terminals that are directly connected for the purposes of normal usage.

inscope.li: items within the scope of application module Conductivity material aspects, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1756;
items within the scope of application module Functional assignment to part, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1674;
items within the scope of application module Network functional usage view, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1705;
items within the scope of application module Package, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1707;
items within the scope of application module Part external reference, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1711;
items within the scope of application module Physical unit usage view, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1732.
